<Heading
  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/products/upload"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint allows you to upload a product.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"An form-data containing the new details.\n","content":{"multipart/form-data":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the product.","example":"sample item"},"image":{"type":"string","format":"binary","description":"The filename of the product's image."},"price":{"type":"number","format":"float","description":"The price of the product.","example":50},"description":{"type":"string","description":"The description of the product.","example":"sample description"},"soldCount":{"type":"integer","description":"The total number of units sold.","example":35}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response. Returns the status of the operation.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"msg":{"type":"string","description":"The status of the operation."}},"example":{"msg":"product saved succesfully"}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
